answers.answer: I have been tested several different times and it is not that :(

If your blood pressure is okay, it is probably "normal" for you.  My brother does this too... he passed out watching America's Funniest Videos once.  The doctor told him he just cuts off his air supply when he laughs too hard.  Fainting spells are caused by a change in pressure as you stand up too fast - try taking a deep breath just before you stand up.  Good health to you.

question: Profile >Every time I start to laugh it feels like my oxygen is suddenly cut off and I start to pass out. I also have tendency once a week to get light headed when I get up from a sitting position to quickly. Do I need to worry about this. I do not smoke but am overweight.
title: Meb90
